title: Enchanting Navaratna Pearl Jhumkas - A Symphony of Colors
materials: adorned with 21.26 carats of lustrous Pearls (Moti) and 11.68 carats of Fancy Navaratna gemstones. Features Pink
features: These exquisite jhumkas feature a delicate floral motif framework that hold Navaratna gems, accented with meticulously placed pearls of varying sizes. The arrangement is meticulously designed to capture and reflect light, creating a dazzling display. Each gemstone is carefully selected for its quality and vibrancy.
colors: and Iridescent Pearls. A harmonious blend of traditional colors for a modern aesthetic.
occasions: festive occasions like Sankranthi or Dussehra
or any special event where you want to make a sophisticated statement. These are also ideal for modern cocktail parties and celebrations.
description: A stunning fusion of traditional South Indian jewelry design with a contemporary sensibility. The Navaratna gemstones are believed to bring prosperity and good fortune, making these jhumkas not only beautiful but also auspicious. The quality of the gold finish and the gemstones ensures lasting beauty and value. They are light weight yet impressive.
